text: Purchased the 2 for $5 each special through the drive up window. The cashier was pleasant and efficient.  The food was cooked well and tasted delicious. I'd visit again for the tasty treats.

text: Food was just edible pizza dry very limited salad bar items , Not enough ice to keep it properly chilled. Restaurant nasty spider webs in windows,dust and debris on glass over salad bar & pizza bar  .About a 2 inch gap where apparent repair work had been done in between and over food area .

name: Shannon Pitts
text: Pizza Hut used to be the best place to go for pizza. The last visit I made was when they still had the lunch buffet. The inside was a mess! I have not been back since last year sometime.
